sentences.sContent: And I prefer to an ampere meter being made of aluminum even though it has analog to another one.
sentences.sCn: 我还想要一个铝制的安培表，虽然它与另一个类似。

sentences.sContent: Ampere meters can record the amount of electrical current passing through an electrical appliance.
sentences.sCn: 电流表可以记录经过用电器的电流的数量。

trans.tranOther: a unit used for measuring electric current
